and( c.cno in( select distinct c.cno from classitem where ciname like '%'||#{searchText} ||'%')

and ((ctitle like '%' || #{searchText} || '%') or (ccontent like '%' || #{searchText} || '%'))
and ctname=#{searchText}
order by cdday
order by chitcount desc
order by cr.cno desc nulls last
order by reviewRatio desc nulls last
